DOC.brief_summary: The aim work test Echelon foot efficiency offer enhance safety , comfort function wide range walking surface , incline stair , thereby improve quality life amputee . DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficiency Echelon Foot Traumatic Trans Tibial Amputees
